statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;

SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
